missions.name: basics
missions.title: Gameplay basics
missions.description: In this training scenario you are going to learn about core game mechanics: moving units, claiming buildings, resources, recruitment and combat.

missions.name: units_buildings
missions.title: Units and buildings
missions.description: In this training scenario you are going to learn about unit types, with their strenghts and weaknesses, as well as all the types of military buildings.

missions.name: unit_abilities
missions.title: Unit levels and abilities
missions.description: In this training scenario you are going to learn about units gaining levels, what kind of benefits this brings, and what kinds of abilities they can use.

missions.name: heroes
missions.title: Hero units
missions.description: In this training scenario you are going to learn about some Hero units and their unique abilities.
